thread.title: BRIEF-ICON Announces Deal With Intel Allowing Integration Of The Intel Pharma Analytics Platform For Clinical Trials

title: BRIEF-ICON Announces Deal With Intel Allowing Integration Of The Intel Pharma Analytics Platform For Clinical Trials

organizations.name: intel pharma analytics platform for clinical trials reuters

text:
April 17, 2018 / 2:08 PM / Updated 29 minutes ago BRIEF-ICON Announces Deal With Intel Allowing Integration Of The Intel Pharma Analytics Platform For Clinical Trials Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 17 (Reuters) - ICON PLC: 
* ICON ANNOUNCES AGREEMENT WITH INTEL ALLOWING INTEGRATION OF THE INTELÂ® PHARMA ANALYTICS PLATFORM FOR CLINICAL TRIALS 
* ICON PLC - AGREED ON PRELIMINARY DEAL TERMS WITH INTEL TO ENABLE ICON TO OFFER INTEL PHARMA ANALYTICS PLATFORM FOR USE IN CLINICAL TRIALS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
